flawed_nl_solution:
The first value drop of the lawnmower was 25/100 * 100 = $<<25/100*100=25>>25.
So the lawnmower was worth 100 - 25 = $<<100-25=70>>70.
Over the next year, the value dropped another 20/100 * 70 = $<<20/100*70=14>>14.
So after all this time, Ben's lawnmower is worth 70 - 14 = $<<70-14=56>>56.
#### 56

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 75, not 70. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
